Posts.EditableText:
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/mb9jvcelwucix2f9salppg/the-folding-of-the-mare
It isn't fancy, but it has a story and visuals, and it is very soft furry science fiction; no hard science is being challenged or claimed. There are in-game advertisements (in some science magazines), so it doesn't cost any money.
